title: Gracious Me. . . Is Nothing Sacred
description: A priest, a Rabbi, and a minister are all discussing how hilarious this book is. Is nothing sacred any more? Not in this book. Come along from the beginning of time with Adam and Eve to the present day and enjoy the most fun you've ever had with religion. Absolutely the greatest non-sectarian funnies, stories, and tidbits from atheists to zen and everything in-between. If you can laugh, you are truly blessed.
author: Thomas F. Shubnell
